name: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Randolph A. SCOTT.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Randolph A. SCOTT.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Randolph A. SCOTT.
No. D-2999.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 2, 2017.
Randolph A. Scott, of Warrington, Pennsylvania, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
